summary: This is an email chain from April 30, 2020, forwarding a message about an OVS (Office for Victims of Crime) application for a potential victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The email discusses the application process and mentions the victim may receive treatment from Randee Kogan.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.role: Trial Attorney at Edwards Pottinger LLC
persons.context: She is the sender of the forwarded email, attaching an OVS application for a potential victim and coordinating with Angela.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: He is copied on the original email regarding the OVS application for a potential Epstein victim.

persons.name: Angela
persons.context: The primary recipient of the email, being asked to review the attached OVS application and provide further instructions.

persons.name: Randee Kogan
persons.context: Mentioned as the intended treatment provider for the potential victim if the OVS application is approved.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email chain, as the OVS application is for a potential victim of his.

connections.description: Henderson is sending an OVS application to Angela for review and coordination regarding a potential Epstein victim.
Both are associated with Edwards Pottinger LLC, and Edwards is copied on the email regarding the victim application.
The OVS application is for a female individual who may have been a victim of Jeffrey Epstein in New York.
If the OVS application is approved, the potential victim is going to receive treatment from Randee Kogan.

events.title: OVS Application Submission
events.description: Brittany Henderson emails Angela attaching an OVS (Office for Victims of Crime) application for a potential female victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Potential Treatment Arrangement
events.description: Plans are mentioned for the potential victim to receive treatment from Randee Kogan if the OVS application is approved.

locations.address: 425 North Andrews Avenue, Suite 2, Fort Lauderdale, Florida 33301
locations.context: The business address of Edwards Pottinger LLC, where Brittany Henderson works.
Mentioned as the location where the potential female victim may have been victimized by Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: An OVS (Office for Victims of Crime) application is being processed for a potential female victim of Jeffrey Epstein, specifically questioning if she was a victim in New York.
The legal firm Edwards Pottinger LLC, via attorney Brittany Henderson, is handling the victim's application and coordination.
If approved, the victim is slated to receive treatment from a therapist named Randee Kogan.
The email chain demonstrates ongoing legal and support efforts for Epstein's victims years after his initial prosecution and death.
